name: Gentle Onset
description: Shape each sound clearly to improve accuracy and smoothness.

name: Prolongation
description: Use light consonant contact to reduce tension.

name: Pull-Out
description: Coordinate breath and voice for smoother speech flow.

name: Block Correction
description: Stretch syllables gently for calm, steady fluency.

name: Flexible Pacing
description: Gently tense and release muscles to reduce speaking tension.
